a.n: Les Pouvoirs Extraordinaires Du Corps Humain

p.d: Did you know that our stomach has as many neurones as the brain of a small domestic pet? Including unusual experiments, recent discoveries and revelations concerning the pros and cons of sugar and fat, Adriana Karembeu and Michel Cymes take us on a journey to discover our intestinal flora. Presentation: Michel Cymes, Adriana Karembeu.
